attributes.title: THIS APP NEEDS TO BE DELETED
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking that I was going to get updates with the president and yet all I got our updates on a tiny little penis man

attributes.title: SUCKY APP
attributes.review: This app has done nothing but harass my phone with irrelevant notifications that do no justice to me, it’s an irresponsible and stupid app, for lack of better terms. 💖💫🧚

attributes.title: He has no lips! How will he get a kiss kiss?? Very ugly! No kiss for himmm
attributes.review: Not a good or wholesome app. Very bad. Very bad. Everyone agrees that this is the WORST app in the App Store. Other apps are far superior. I would know. Believe meh.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: The WORST app I’ve ever seen!! It will kill your dog and burn your house down!! Many people agreed that this is the most disturbing app on the entire App Store. Remove it immediately!!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: This app is not it if I could give it 0 stars I would. When I opened the app my dog 🐕died of a heart ❤️attack RIP Buddy. It also made me throw up non stop🤮🤢

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Do not download. I got a horrible virus after downloading and my phone has been messed up since. Incredibly angry 😠

attributes.title: Horrible worthless waste of time
attributes.review: Totally unusable just the worst app I have ever in my life ever seen ever , just garbage, it needs to go.

attributes.title: I HATE THIS APP
attributes.review:
I was disgusted to find out that this app broke my phone 😾 I got it and a demon possessed it 🙀 the demon ate my phone and pooped out a Cheeto do not get this app it’s a waste of space just like trump 😽 remember, BLM ✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿

attributes.title: severely disappointed
attributes.review: Terrible app!! Hard to navigate and get factual information from it. Spreads stupidity and racism, horrible application.

attributes.title: Useless app!!
attributes.review: If I can give this app zero stars, I would! Crashes constantly and is slow!!!!!!!!! Regret downloading!!!!!
